bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
